chapter.title: Miplatform Service
chapter.para: When using MiPlatform for developing application UI, there are many difficulties in reflecting the specific data format of MiPlatform in DB.

For instance, if there are 10 columns and 10 records to insert, to carry out JDBC coding, the developer has to get each value of the 10 columns and loop 10 times to develop the logic to execute insert string.
Also when searching DB, ResultSet meta information has to be used to set Dataset columns and loop in order to develop logic that adds ResultSet value to Dataset.

para.emphasis: Anyframe Ria MiPlatform uses the special data format for MiPlatform to provide common business service and Controller to CRUDE DB.

chapter.para: The advantages of Anyframe Ria MiPlatform are as follows.

listitem.para: Can develop business service without changing the specific data format of MiPlatform such as Dataset and VariableList.
For CRUD, which does not need additional business logic, query needed for query mapping file can be developed without developing business service.
Can easily develop business service, because the part that needs extension can selectively be overridden for use.
Functions do not overlap and unnecessary classes are not created, so the number of total classes decreases and maintenance is convenient.

chapter.para: Anyframe Ria MiPlatform is largely classified into Controller, Service, and Dao.

listitem.para: Controller – MiPController : Class that is an expansion of operate() of AnyframeMiPController. Business service method is called and result value is transferred to screen at the request of user.
Service interface – MiPService : Provides API that can search, add, delete, modify, etc. data in DB using DatasetList and VariableList.
Service implementation class – MiPServiceImpl : Implementation class of MiPService. Maps Dataset with query id to be executed, calls MiPDao method, and adds query execution result to DatasetList.
Dao interface - MiPDao : Receives entered Dataset or VariableList and query id with parameter, and provides API to execute query.
Dao implementation class – MiPDaoQuery : Implementation class of MiPDao. Calls MiPQueryService method according to parameter type to execute query.

section.title: Controller
section.para: Anyframe provides AnyframeMiPController and AnyframeMiPDispatchController that implements the Controller of Spring MVC so that user request can be processed through UI based on MiPlatform. In order to inherit these two classes and implement Controller class, Controller class should be implemented by each user request. In this case, the number of Controller classes to be developed increases, and maintenance becomes difficult. To solve this problem, Anyframe Ria MiPlatform provides MiPController.

section.title: MiPController
section.para: In case of UI based on JSP, Controller is called at user request and Controller needs a logic to transfer the business service call result value to page. However, for UI based on MiPlatform, the data format (DatasetList, VariableList) exchanged between view and server are the same, and the request page and result page are the same, which makes common handling possible. Therefore, if there are no separate logic other than business service call, MiPController can be used as the common Controller.

The following is a part of operate() method for MiPController. Business service object is obtained from WebApplicationContext using the business service bean id obtained from page. The method name of bean id and business service to be executed is decided according to the service (i.e., boardService.getPagingList) value of deService.
If there is no service value like the figure below, the bean id of business service is mipService and the method name is the prefix of the dsService SVC_ID value.
From prefix can come get, getList, getPagingList, create, update, remove, and saveAll. If prefix is getList, getList() of MiPService is executed.

section.title: Service
section.para: Service of Anyframe Ria MiPlatform consists of MiPService, which is Interface, and MiPServiceImpl, which is implementation class.

section.title: Dao
section.para: Dao of Anyframe Ria MiPlatform consists of MiPDao, which is and interface, and MiPDaoQuery, which is implementation class.

section.title: MiPDao
section.para: MiPDao interface uses two data formats (VariableList, Dataset) to provide CRUD function to database. It can be easily used because method is separated by input parameter, and functions of DB work that can be done with Dataset and VariableList include most functions.
The return type of methods, except for get, getList, and getPagingList that provide search functions, is int and the number of records that are CUD in DB.

section.title: MiPDaoQuery
section.para: MiPDaoQuery is implementation class of MiPDao interface, and executes query using MiPQueryService.
Among MiPDaoQuery, the following is saveAll() that stores (adds, modifies, deletes) Dataset record in DB Table.
You can see that MiPQueryService update() is being called using query id and Dataset in map form for insert, update, and delete.
Using implementation provided by Anyframe Ria MiPlatform is recommended for MiPDaoQuery, and extended only when necessary.

section.title: Extension of MiPServiceImpl
section.para: When additional function is needed other than provided by MiPService, you can define additional API or override relative method.
The following is an example of expanding saveAll() by overriding to set a single ID in the ‘PROD_NO’ column before inserting Dataset record in DB.

ProductActionCommand that is the implementation of IMiPActionCommand provided by Anyframe, is being transferred to the saveAll() parameter of MiPDao. When using IMiPActionCommand, Necessary business logic can be executed before and after executing specific string.

section.title: [Note] IMiPActionCommand
section.para: IMiPActionCommand is the interface provided to add necessary business logic before and after executing insert, update, and delete query when save() of MiPQueryService is called. Define a separate class that implements IMiPActionCommand interface, and add business logic to relevant method.

The following is a part of preInsert() for ProductActionCommand class. You can see that the single value for the primary key PROD_NO column is being set using IdGenerationService before inserting Dataset into a specific table.
Therefore, preInsert() of ProductActionCommand is called to execute additional logic before inserting in DB the record which the Dataset status is 'insert' for MiPQueryService save().
